title: Releasing Your Potential Expanded Edition: Exposing the Hidden You
description: Releasing Your Potential Expanded Edition with Study Guide is a complete, integrated, principles-centered approach to release the awesome potential trapped within you. With penetrating insights and pointed anecdotes, this book reveals a step-by-step pathway to releasing your potential. If you have been frustrated by your dreams, ideas, and visions, this book will activate your buried treasure and ignite the wheels of productivity. It will release a death blow to procrastination and set you on a path to personal fulfillment, purpose, and productivity. Releasing Your Potential will enable you to...
author: Myles Munroe
